title: Benny & Joon
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Susan Arnold, Donna Roth and Jerremiah Chechik
brief_description: Benny runs a car repair shop and also look after his mentally ill sister, Joon, who tends to create disturbances when left unattended. After Joon suffers a losing night of poker, Benny must also take in Sam, a friend’s cousin, who has his own share of erratic personality traits. Not surprisingly, Sam and Joon immediately hit it off. As they fall deeper in love, Benny must deal with new feelings of jealousy and of not being needed so much by his sister. Cast includes: Johnny Depp, Mary Stuart Masterson, Aidan Quinn, Julianne Moore and Oliver Platt.
